remarks: Ring addition operation.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
erngset.h-r $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
erngset.t-r $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
erngset.e-r $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
erngset.d-r $e |- D = ( ( EDRingR ` K ) ` W ) $.
erng.p-r $e |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) $.
erngplus2-rN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ V e. E /\ F e. T ) ) -> ( ( U .+ V ) ` F ) = ( ( U ` F ) o. ( V ` F ) ) ) $.
